title.narrative: 2020 Project - Inclusive Africa Conference on Digital Accessibility

description.narrative: Inclusive Africa conference will start the needed conversation on digital accessibility with key decision makers in government and private sector, while raising the visibility and importance of digital accessibility of online products and services. The event will bring together government, experts and accessibility professionals working to advance computer technology, accessibility and inclusion. It is an opportunity to share knowledge, network, and explore new ways to improve accessibility and inclusion for all people, particularly persons with disabilities.
